representation_information.name: MXF Generic Container with Uncompressed Video Essence UYVY (2vuy)
representation_information.description: MXF file with the Generic Container implementation for uncompressed video, with a picture essence structure identical to that identified by the FOURCC code UYVY. In the SMPTE MXF specification (ST 377-1), the structure is identified using the Apple four-character code 2vuy. This picture data is typically associated with soundtrack essences and, as available, timecode, closed captioning, and other elements.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
